parameters.responseBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ error: 'unauthorized', status: 401, message: 'Invalid or expired admin token' }) }}

parameters.query:
SELECT 
  ae.id,
  ae.action,
  ae.resource_type,
  ae.resource_id,
  ae.metadata,
  ae.ip,
  ae.user_agent,
  ae.created_at,
  u.username,
  u.first_name,
  u.last_name
FROM audit_events ae
LEFT JOIN users u ON ae.user_id = u.id
WHERE ($1::text IS NULL OR ae.action = $1)
  AND ($2::uuid IS NULL OR ae.user_id = $2)
ORDER BY ae.created_at DESC
LIMIT $3 OFFSET $4;

options.queryReplacement: ={{ [$('Extract Data').item.json.action || null, $('Extract Data').item.json.userId || null, $('Extract Data').item.json.limit, $('Extract Data').item.json.offset] }}

parameters.query:
SELECT COUNT(*) as total
FROM audit_events
WHERE ($1::text IS NULL OR action = $1)
  AND ($2::uuid IS NULL OR user_id = $2);
